tool.name: Create New Table
tool.description: Creates a new empty table.<br/><br/>Possible field types are:<br/>- string<br/>- date<br/>- color<br/>- unsigned 1 byte integer<br/>- signed 1 byte integer<br/>- unsigned 2 byte integer<br/>- signed 2 byte integer<br/>- unsigned 4 byte integer<br/>- signed 4 byte integer<br/>- unsigned 8 byte integer<br/>- signed 8 byte integer<br/>- 4 byte floating point number<br/>- 8 byte floating point number<br/>- binary<br/>
